references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting, which is the structural format used by M3.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields, which revolutionized 3D scene representation and is related to Gaussian Splatting.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, which is one of the foundation models M3 uses to extract features.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This paper introduces Transformers for image recognition, used in Foundation Models in M3.

references.paper_title: Feature 3dgs: Supercharging 3d gaussian splatting to enable distilled feature fields
references.reason: This paper is the previous paper on feature splatting, which introduces feature representations to 3DGS.
